data.text: This video comes to you from Dillon, Colorado, where I'm spending Christmas with my family.

translation.text: Video này đến với bạn từ Dillon, Colorado, nơi tôi đang đón Giáng sinh cùng gia đình.

data.text: as a Z. Unfortunately, there are no rules to tell you why the S is pronounced as a Z.
